Y’all are disgusting. Can’t you just enjoy the gameplay without crying about the price for just a few hours? Yes it’s $80. Yes it seems expensive. But if you think about how long this took the dev teams to make and the amount of care they’ve poured into it, I think it’s worth it.
This is a hilarious part of the internet right now.
